key.name: highlight-path
key.description: Path to scrollable actor candidate. Should be empty array unless the user is picking an actor right now.

key.name: picking-actor-path-action
key.summary: Name of switch action currently being picking actor for.
key.description: Unless empty, used in 'VALUE-path' as key of setting to pick actor path for.

key.name: workspaces-switcher-path
key.description: Path to workspaces switcher scrollable actor. Empty array to disable the switcher.

key.name: workspaces-switcher-width
key.description: Minimum width to set for workspaces switcher scrollable actor.

key.name: workspaces-switcher-horizontal-multiplier
key.summary: Horizontal scrolling multiplier for switching workspaces.
key.description: Distance multiplier of workspaces switching for horizontal scrolling.

key.name: workspaces-switcher-vertical-multiplier
key.summary: Vertical scrolling multiplier for switching workspaces.
key.description: Distance multiplier of workspaces switching for vertical scrolling.

key.name: workspaces-switcher-cycle
key.summary: Enable cyclic scrolling for switching workspaces.
key.description: Whether is workspaces switching is cyclic.

key.name: workspaces-switcher-visualize
key.description: Whether visualize workspaces switching or not.

key.name: workspaces-switcher-timeout
key.description: After switching, further scrolling will be ignored by workspaces switcher for the timeout.

key.name: windows-switcher-path
key.description: Path to windows switcher scrollable actor. Empty array to disable the switcher.

key.name: windows-switcher-width
key.description: Minimum width to set for windows switcher scrollable actor.

key.name: windows-switcher-horizontal-multiplier
key.summary: Horizontal scrolling multiplier for switching windows.
key.description: Distance multiplier of windows switching for horizontal scrolling.

key.name: windows-switcher-vertical-multiplier
key.summary: Vertical scrolling multiplier for switching windows.
key.description: Distance multiplier of windows switching for vertical scrolling.

key.name: windows-switcher-cycle
key.summary: Enable cyclic scrolling for switching windows.
key.description: Whether is windows switching is cyclic.

key.name: windows-switcher-visualize
key.description: Whether visualize windows switching or not.

key.name: windows-switcher-timeout
key.description: After switching, further scrolling will be ignored by windows switcher for the timeout.
